summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 11.5°C) and outside temperature (down 11.3°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 11%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 342 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 230 m), and outside humidity (down 6%) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 341.8m lower than yesterday, 224.7m lower than past week, 229.6m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 425m minimum and 1526m maximum, with an average of 611.2m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 836.0m and 840.9m.
cloud levels.summary: Low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; cold weather is expected. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and winds should remain light. Drizzle or light rain possible, low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds, and the light is absent. Little change in the weather.
